description: Detects registry changes to Office trust records where the path is located in a potentially suspicious location
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
name: Macro Enabled In A Potentially Suspicious Document
query: (winlog.event_data.EventType:"Setvalue" AND winlog.event_data.TargetObject:*\\Security\\Trusted\ Documents\\TrustRecords* AND winlog.event_data.TargetObject:(*\/AppData\/Local\/Microsoft\/Windows\/INetCache\/* OR *\/AppData\/Local\/Temp\/* OR *\/PerfLogs\/* OR *C\:\/Users\/Public\/* OR *file\:\/\/\/D\:\/* OR *file\:\/\/\/E\:\/*))
